Parameters.Name: QuickInstall-3-1-6 Last Clock Synchronization change even (SetSystemDateAndTime)

Test.TestName: QuickInstall-3-1-6 Features detection
Test.Name: GetServices and Digest suported
Test.Description: GetServices - supported. Digest - supported.

Test.TestName: QuickInstall-3-1-6 Last Clock Synchronization change even (SetSystemDateAndTime)
Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Check QuickInstall-3-1-6 Last Clock Synchronization change event (SetSystemDateAndTime) test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: A.3: DaylightSavings was changed

Test.Description: Check QuickInstall-3-1-6 4.3.6 Last Clock Synchronization change event (SetSystemDateAndTime) test when DUT sends correct response

Test.Name: LastClockSynchronization less than initial
